XXn2927u_001:0: Buddhakapālatantra 9 caryāpaṭala athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi caryāpaṭalaṃ sudurlabham |
XXn2927u_001:1: yena yogī kurute sarva caryā atyantavarāṅganā || 1 ||
XXn2927u_001:4: yad yat sattvāḥ siddhyarthino tāṃ tāṃ dāpayet sadā || 2 ||
XXn2927u_001:6: kare kapālaṃ gṛhītvā caryā bhramate vratī |
XXn2927u_001:7: nagno muktaśikho bhūtvā yatra tatra yadā tadā |
XXn2927u_001:11: bhikṣām aṭate prājñaḥ gṛhe gṛhe niḥsaṃśayaḥ |
XXn2927u_001:16: na iti śūnyatābhāvaṃ dadāti it bhāvanām || 5 ||
XXn2927u_001:18: jā ity anuttaram yānaṃ mahāmudrā sa kathyate |
XXn2927u_001:21: paścād bhakṣayed dravyaṃ kapāle tu vyavasthitam |
XXn2927u_001:30: (2) tathā coktaṃ tantre- jathā pi tatha pi jaha pi taha pi jena tena hua buddha |
XXn2927u_001:31: saiṃ vi-appe ṇāsi-ā sa-ala sahāve śuddha || 9 ||
XXn2927u_001:33: iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare caryāpaṭalo navamaḥ || ||
XXn2927u_001:38: muktikā śuktikā caiva rājapaṭa pravālasya ca |
XXn2927u_001:42: na ta auṣadha bāhyam ity uktam- na cāpi cchalla pallavaḥ sa ca |
XXn2927u_001:46: na cāpi aparalohasyāpi siddham auṣadham uttamam || 3 ||
XXn2927u_001:52: ke te auṣadhi divyā siddhiś ca kīdṛśī bhavet |
XXn2927u_001:53: kathāyāhi tvaṃ mahādevī śrotum icchāmi ādarāt || 5 ||
XXn2927u_001:61: kena dravyaṃ bahavo yānti vandhyā sutavatī bhavet |
XXn2927u_001:62: mṛtavān saṃjīvate na mriyate punaḥ punaḥ || 7 ||
XXn2927u_001:66: sa ca sidhyante subhājanaṃ divyaṃ na jānanti bāla mohitāḥ || 8 ||
XXn2927u_001:69: kathaṃ sattvārtha sādhyante hā hā kaṣṭaikatatparam || 9 ||
XXn2927u_001:73: nāḍi madhye rasanī nāma tiṣṭhanti divyamahauṣadhī || 10 ||
XXn2927u_001:75: lohaṃ yena hematāṃ yānty ekenāsaṅkhyaṃ vidhyati |
XXn2927u_001:87: tathāgatān sevayantī nityaṃ suguptā nirghṛṇaḥ sa ca || 14 ||
XXn2927u_001:91: śīghradrutir bhaved yasya sa na sidhyati || 15 ||
XXn2927u_001:97: tathā coktam- dhairyaṃ hi parama nāyakapadam |
XXn2927u_001:99: ata eva hi vīracetasā kāryaṃ subhājane pracodayet || 17 ||
XXn2927u_001:104: tatra hrīṃkārabījaṃ sarvadravyaika pūrvaṃ merurājena bhūṣitam || 18 ||
XXn2927u_001:112: paścāt karma samārabhet prājño vīrayogena cetasā |
XXn2927u_001:115: subhājane viśramate tatra cyutiyogāt kharaṇam eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:116: śīghraṃ divyaṃ samāgṛhya guḍā lepayed budhaḥ || 22 ||
XXn2927u_001:120: (8) paścād rakṣate prājñaḥ hemo bhavati niḥsaṃśayaḥ || 23 ||
XXn2927u_001:131: ayam apramāṇaṃ yaḥ karoti prājñaḥ śrutavanto mahāmatiḥ |
XXn2927u_001:132: te sarve narakaṃ yānti yāvad buddhair na hīyate || 26 ||
XXn2927u_001:144: jīvate kalpokoṭiṃ naraḥ yāvad buddhajñānam eva ca || 29 ||
XXn2927u_001:150: pañcavarṇarajaḥ kṛtya atha vā śuklam eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:158: sā strī yā vandhyā tasyā eva |
XXn2927u_001:165: caturbhujam ekavaktraṃ ca evam uccāraṇan viduḥ |
XXn2927u_001:177: iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare divyamahauṣadhivandhyāsnānavidhipaṭalo daśamaḥ || ||
XXn2927u_001:183: pūrvoktacihnabhujādyaiḥ paraṃ hi varṇa śuklam eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:184: digyoginī bhavet śuklaṃ vidig raktam eva ca || 2 ||
XXn2927u_001:196: daṣṭaka bhūtale na kiṃcij jīvāpayituṃ śakyate |
XXn2927u_001:207: tasya hṛdaye likhen mantraṃ yatra tatra patre tathā |
XXn2927u_001:208: mahātailena kṛtvā masīṃ mantraṃ likhed viduḥ || 9 ||
XXn2927u_001:220: evaṃ paripūrṇaṃ kṛtvā patra hṛdaya sthāpayet |
XXn2927u_001:224: ghaṭ ghaṭ ghaḍa ghaḍa hrīḥ hrīḥ haḥ haḥ he he haṃ haḥ || 12 ||
XXn2927u_001:228: ekasmin khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ bhūtvā patati daṣṭakotthati nātra saṃśayaḥ || 13 ||
XXn2927u_001:232: pañcadaśa pustake na likhitaṃ gamyate guruprasādataḥ || 14 ||
XXn2927u_001:237: (15) 12 nānāmantraprayogapaṭala atha vajrapāṇiś citrasenā yoginī muhur muhuḥ praṇipatyaivam uvāca- || 1 ||
XXn2927u_001:240: uktaṃ tvayā yat prayogaṃ trailokyeṣv api durlabham || 2 ||
XXn2927u_001:242: dṛṣṭā mayā sarvatantrāṇi ye te prayogāḥ sudurlabhāḥ |
XXn2927u_001:243: iha tantre tvayā yad uktaṃ sarvabuddhair na bhāṣitāḥ || 3 ||
XXn2927u_001:246: aho hī sarvabuddhasaṃjananī aho hī mahāmudrātatpari || 4 ||
XXn2927u_001:248: bhāṣasva devi sarvamantrāṇāṃ ye te prayogāḥ sudurlabhāḥ |
XXn2927u_001:249: (16) yogino yena citraṃ kurvanti nānāścaryam eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:250: prathamapaṭale yad yad uktaṃ devi tatproyogaṃ kathayāhi me || 5 ||
XXn2927u_001:252: īdṛg vacanaṃ śrutvā citrasenā tu yoginī |
XXn2927u_001:256: mārāḥ sarve prapalāyanti vighnāś ca pralayaṃ gatāḥ |
XXn2927u_001:257: āścaryaṃ jinavaraiḥ sarvaiḥ aho hāsasya niścayaḥ || 7 ||
XXn2927u_001:261: tasya kaṭibhāgāsthiṃ tu gṛhītvā kuṇḍa kārayet || 8 ||
XXn2927u_001:263: tasya kāpālam anu gṛhya tenaiva śirasā varti dāpayet |
XXn2927u_001:268: yogī buddhakāpāladharo bhūtvā imaṃ mantram uccārayan || 10 ||
XXn2927u_001:270: oṃ buddhakapālinī dhara 2 dhadhara 2 dharāpaya 2 śoṣaya 2 tāpaya 2 drāṃ 2 āṃ māṃ sāṃ ra vāṃ kuru 2 bho bhagavati buddhakāpālasyājñā mā laṃghaya śīghraṃ kajjala pata pata pātaya 2 oṃ 2 āḥ hūṃ sumbhaya bho bhagavati hūṃ srāṃ phaṭ || 11 ||
XXn2927u_001:282: (18) paścād yogī mahāprājñaḥ kelimālinī pivetaṃ punaḥ || 14 ||
XXn2927u_001:287: nagnī muktaśikhī bhūtvā hāḥhoḥmantram uccārayed viduḥ |
XXn2927u_001:288: kelimālinī pivāpayet tatra paścāt krīḍā samārabhet || 16 ||
XXn2927u_001:291: kajjalaṃ tu mahādivyaṃ vāmahaste tu sthāpayet || 17 ||
XXn2927u_001:293: paścāt śanaiḥ kāryaiḥ kurvād yogaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ |
XXn2927u_001:299: ekaikavaṭikāṃ aṣṭottaramantraśatenābhimantrya japet- oṃ buddhakāpālinī hrī hūṃ phaṭ || 20 ||
XXn2927u_001:301: anena mantreṇa kajjalaṃ tu mahābāho trailokyeṣv api durlabham |
XXn2927u_001:309: vāmahastamalitamātreṇa tatkṣaṇād eva bhadrako sa jāyate || 23 ||
XXn2927u_001:315: vāmahaste malitamātreṇa svastho bhavati na saṃśayaḥ || 25 ||
XXn2927u_001:325: pratimāṃ tu liṅgaparvatavṛkṣaṃ tu anyāni yāni tāni ca |
XXn2927u_001:329: punar vāmena malitamātreṇa svastho bhavati na saṃśayaḥ |
XXn2927u_001:333: tridaśeṣu bhramet prājñaḥ yad yad vastum icchati |
XXn2927u_001:343: tathā makṣikāś ca tathā hasti gardabham eva ca || 32 ||
XXn2927u_001:381: (22) oṃ buddhakāpālinī dhara 2 hā he ho haṃ haḥ |
XXn2927u_001:384: oṃ buddhakāpālinī rama 2 krīḍa 2 haṃ haḥ |
XXn2927u_001:385: mahiṣāsthikena ratikrīḍā dvādaśavarṣā sa rātrau dine naro cit- taṃ na patati || 45 ||
XXn2927u_001:387: oṃ buddhakāpālinī taṭa 2 trāṭaya 2 maṭ sphaṭ sphoṭaya utpāṭaya hūṃ phaṭ |
XXn2927u_001:390: oṃ sukapālinī ghara 2 maṭa 2 trāṭaya 2 paṭa 2 praṭāpaya 2 truṭa sphaṭa moṭaya 2 saṃkrāmaya hrīṃ hūṃ trayāṃ phaṭ |
XXn2927u_001:393: oṃ buddhakāpālinī he trāsaya māraya ghuṭa ghuṭinī sarvavanaspatīnāṃ hṛdaya tāḍaya vidrāpaya rama 2 trāsaya 2 bho bhagavatī aṃ āṃ āṃ taṭ 2 hūṃ phaṭ |
XXn2927u_001:396: āha- citt' eka vimala darppaṇaṃ jaṃ cintijai taṃ pi pati viśvaṃ jāṇanti vi śuaṇā |
XXn2927u_001:399: (23) iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare nānā- mantraprayogaḥ paṭalo dvādaśamaḥ || ||
XXn2927u_001:401: (24) 13 cittaviśuddhipaṭala athātaḥ saṃpravakṣyāmi viśuddhipaṭalaṃ śuddha durlabham || 1 ||
XXn2927u_001:403: bhaginī bhāginī jananī duhitā bhāryā-m-eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:404: evaṃ kāmayet prājña mahāmudrāṃ yad iṣyate || 2 ||
XXn2927u_001:408: evaṃ kāmayed dhīmān pañcaite yoginī varām || 3 ||
XXn2927u_001:412: bhaginī bhavet cakṣur bhāginī tu śrotram eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:413: jananī bhaved ghrāṇaṃ rasaṃ duhitā tu eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:417: nartakī bhaven mohaṃ dveṣaṃ ḍombinīṣu ca |
XXn2927u_001:422: cakṣuṣā dṛśyate mohaṃ śabdaṃ dveṣo'pi jāyate |
XXn2927u_001:423: ghrāṇena bhujyate rāgaṃ rasaṃ mānaṃ tu eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:424: sparśena jāyate īrṣyā cittasyāśuddham eva ca || 7 ||
XXn2927u_001:427: siddhir na syād bhavet śuddhyā punarjanmabhavāntare || 8 ||
XXn2927u_001:430: bhāvaḥ kīdṛśaṃ abhāvo bhāvo bhāvyaḥ kathaṃ bhavet || 9 ||
XXn2927u_001:432: bhaginī kathaṃ rūpaṃ gaurī śyāmā kṛṣṇavarṇajām |
XXn2927u_001:433: īdṛśaṃ rūpa saṃyuktaṃ śuddhacitto na drakṣyati || 10 ||
XXn2927u_001:435: bhāginī kathaṃ śrūyate śabdaḥ dhvanis trividham eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:438: ghrāṇaṃ trividhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kā yā sā jananī suguhyakā |
XXn2927u_001:441: svajihvena bhuñjate dravyaṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ svāda yādṛśī |
XXn2927u_001:442: svādena bhuñjate yuktaṃ svādaṃ rūpasya kīdṛśī || 13 ||
XXn2927u_001:448: bhāve na abhāvo asti abhāvam eva ca |
XXn2927u_001:453: dṛṣṭiyuktaṃ bhavet karuṇā maitrī āliṅganasya ca ||
XXn2927u_001:455: ubhayamelāpakaṃ tat kṣaraṇam upekṣā rasā smṛtā mayā || 17 ||
XXn2927u_001:458: (27) darśanāj jāyate duḥkham āliṅganāt kiṃcit tatphalam |
XXn2927u_001:461: evaṃ traidhātuka utpannaṃ harṣaviṣāda etat phalam |
XXn2927u_001:464: yat kiṃcit khāna pānaṃ ca sukhāvahabhojanaṃ tathā |
XXn2927u_001:465: tat sarvaṃ viṇmūtrādi prakalpayet yogavit sadā || 20 ||
XXn2927u_001:468: malanaḥ mardanaś caiva mahāmudrā sa kathyate |
XXn2927u_001:472: tāṃ pūjayed yogī kāmate na ca lipyate || 22 ||
XXn2927u_001:474: lepa īrṣyādisaṃyuktaṃ tasya doṣair na bādhyate |
XXn2927u_001:475: sa yogī paramaṃ tattvam bhavadoṣair na lipyate || 23 ||
XXn2927u_001:477: yāvan na viṣaya unmuli-ai tāma budhataṇu kema |
XXn2927u_001:480: (28) iti buddhakapālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare cit- taviśuddhipaṭalaḥ trayodaśamaḥ || ||
XXn2927u_001:485: tathā- atha vajrapāṇiprabhṛtayo bodhisattvāḥ sumeruparamāṇura- jasamā yoginyaḥ,
XXn2927u_001:489: sarvabuddhānāṃ tu jananī lakṣmī ghorā mahāyaśā |
XXn2927u_001:495: buddhakāpāle mahātantre buddhair yeṣāṃ na prakāśitā |
XXn2927u_001:497: tāṃ bhāṣitā devī eka rutena prakaṭīkṛtāḥ || 5 ||
XXn2927u_001:507: tathāgatāś ca sarvabuddhāḥ śṛṇvantu nāgāś ca sadevamānuṣāḥ || 7 ||
XXn2927u_001:509: ayaṃ tantrarājasya pāṭhamātreṇa yat puṇyaṃ tat sarvapuṇyam anumodayantu pariṇāmayantu mahāmudrārthe niryātayantu buddhaguṇākarān || 8 ||
XXn2927u_001:517: yad icchet siddhiṃ varāṃ divyāṃ japed buddhakāpālayogataḥ || 10 ||
XXn2927u_001:519: oṃ hrīṃ buddha hūṃ kāpālinī āḥ ||
XXn2927u_001:529: evaṃjāpaṃ mānayuktaṃ siddhir bhavati na saṃśayaḥ || 12 ||
XXn2927u_001:531: hṛdayamantraḥ- oṃ buddhakāpālinī āḥ hīḥ haiḥ hūṃ phaṭ || 13 ||
XXn2927u_001:533: upahṛdayamantraḥ- oṃ buddhakāpālavajriṇi hau durjaya durlakṣe hūṃ phaṭ || 14 ||
XXn2927u_001:544: harṣitā devī dṛṣṭvā idam vacanam abravīt |
XXn2927u_001:551: paścāt ātmānaṃ niryātayet prājña dṛḍhabhaktena cetasā || 20 ||
XXn2927u_001:557: tatraiva tiṣṭhanti sarvaḍākinyaḥ anye ye ca kṛpākulāḥ || 22 ||
XXn2927u_001:559: indī yattha vilayagau naṭṭa vi appasahāva |
XXn2927u_001:560: so hale paramāṇandagai phuḍa pucchaha gurupā-a || 23 ||
XXn2927u_001:562: tasmai namo yadudayena samānakālam astaṅgatāni viṣayaiḥ samam indriyāṇi |
XXn2927u_001:566: iti buddhakāpālatantre yoginīniruttare guhyātiguhyatare jāpamudrādhyeṣaṇāsarvatantranidānapaṭalaś caturdaśaḥ || ||
XXn2927u_001:568: idam avocat citrasenāyoginīprabhṛtayaḥ sarvayoginyaḥ vajraprāṇiprabhṛtibodhisattvā sarve mahābodhisattva svakas- vake sthāne viharan |
